extends Object
    Author:
    fhanssen This static class holds useful helper methods, that have to be reused for multiple queries.

      • generateChartConfig

        public static submodule.data.ChartConfig generateChartConfig(Map<String,Object> result,
                                                             String name,
                                                             String chartTitle,
                                                             String tabTitle)
        Method turns retrieved data to a chart config. can be arbitrarily extended with more parameters. Be careful with adding data. You somehow need to ensure that your data order matches the category order (here xCategories holds the names, data holds the respective values, the need to be in the correct order to allow matching later!) Most common: xcategories and data: so this is used here, anything else has to be added to the returned chartconfig
        Parameters:
        result - Map holding categories as key, and the respective values as values
        name - name in mainconfig, should be unique to all others
        chartTitle - Chart title, stored in config and later displayed
        tabTitle - Title displayed in tab header
        Returns:
        ChartConfig

      • addPercentages

        public static submodule.data.ChartConfig addPercentages(submodule.data.ChartConfig chartConfig)
        This method adds the percentages as yCategories to a given chartconfig. This means it takes each value from the xCategories and computes its percentage to the total sum. The respective percentage can then be found at the same position in the yCategories.
        Parameters:
        chartConfig -
        Returns:
